data.text: @overseasuse おっしゃる通りです⭐️未来社会は総裁先生の上に成り立っています。配信内容に賛同致します。⭐️

@futukatu8SHINRI That's right.
The future society will be built on the words of Master Ryuho Okawa.👍✨
@overseasuse バイデン氏の配信内容を読ませていただきました。対ロシア🇷🇺に！残念な結果にガッカリです。やはり、、米国🇺🇸リーダには良いリーダシップは期待出来ませんですね‼️先の未来は総裁先生の心が決めて下さいます。私たちは総裁先生に付いて行くのみです。
@zongzi031 There was massive fraud in the presidential election.
@overseasuse Then why didn't you choose Trump as president?
@zongzi031 The reason for this is that Biden is the president. If it were President Trump, that would not have happened.
@overseasuse This is also a government issue. Why does the US government not protect the people?
@overseasuse This would not be the case if the United States took protective measures
